mapper.select: SELECT q.qst_no, q.me_id, q.title, q.reg_dt, q.qst_img, q.prdt_id, CASE WHEN q.qst_status = cd.cod_cd THEN cd.cod_title ELSE q.qst_status END AS qst_status, q.qst_yn, q.content FROM qna q JOIN member m ON q.me_id = m.me_id LEFT JOIN code_detail cd ON q.qst_status = cd.cod_cd WHERE M.me_id = #{meId}
